page.title: 17 Amenities
page.content: Sevenoaks provides a lot of helpful things. It has a wide range of facilities for everyone to use. Knole House, situated in large grounds is the main attraction. It also contains a Golf course. Otherwise Sevenoaks is a quiet town. In our area there are at least 7 schools; Lady Boswell's, St. Johns, Sevenoaks Prep. Oak Bank Walthamstow Hall, Sevenoaks School and Wildernesse. There is Dorton House,a school for blind children. There are eight churches, one railway station and a small hospital. A new swimming pool has recently been opened and a new library is being built. For entertainment Sevenoaks has a combined theatre and cinema.
